sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Col, Row, Container, Input, Label, ModalBody } from "reactstrap"; import _ from "lodash"; import { Switch } from '@6d-ui/form'; import { FieldItem, FIELD_TYPES } from '@6d-ui/fields'; const Details = (props)=>{ const buybackData = props; console.log(buybackData) // const [height, setHeight] = useState(window.innerHeight); const [viewData, setViewData]= useState({}); useEffect(() => { console.log(buybackData) window.addEventListener("resize", () => setHeight(window.innerHeight - 68)); }, []); useEffect(() => { if(buybackData){ setViewData(buybackData); } }, [buybackData]) return (
Detailed View {viewData.fgCode}
Fg Code {viewData.fgCode} Status {viewData.status}
Buyback Type {viewData.buyBackType} Channel {viewData.channel}
Distributer {viewData.distributer} Region {viewData.region}
Outlet {viewData.outlet} Cluster {viewData.cluster}
validity range {viewData.fromDate} - {viewData.toDate} Sell True Check {viewData.sellThruCheck ? "Yes" :"No"}
) } export default Details;
